title: E-commerce Platform
description: A full-stack e-commerce solution with headless CMS integration.
longDescription: Built with Next.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS, this e-commerce platform features a headless CMS, cart functionality, payment processing with Stripe, and user authentication.

title: Dashboard Analytics
description: Interactive analytics dashboard with real-time data visualization.
longDescription: A comprehensive analytics dashboard built with React, D3.js, and Firebase. Features real-time data updates, interactive charts, and customizable widgets.

title: Task Management App
description: Collaborative task management application with real-time updates.
longDescription: A task management application built with React, Redux, and Socket.io for real-time collaboration. Features include drag-and-drop task organization, comments, attachments, and team collaboration.

title: Personal Finance Tracker
description: Mobile-first application for tracking personal expenses and budgeting.
longDescription: A personal finance application built with React Native and Firebase. Features include expense tracking, budget planning, financial goals, and visualization of spending patterns.
